hostname: Half-Life 2
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure
map : bm_c2a2a at: -1859 x, 2523 y, 1056 z
players : 1 (1 max)

userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr

3 “CleverWaffle” UNKNOWN 02:47 15 0 active loopback

and here is the getpos:

setpos -1859.033569 2523.731201 1056.031250;setang 3.922119 96.443481 0.000000
